Gilles Bertaux : Product Design + Growth

I love building, writing and reading about products, startups and technology. I am also big on side projects. I aim for great customer experiences and detailed yet simple, effective designs. Feel free to reach out.

I do: Product Management, Product Design & Growth.
Current status: Growth Hacker at Mention.
Formerly: Product Designer at TOTEMS (acquired by Stripe).

SIDE-PROJECTS

  • TubeList ➞

    Product Design

    Growth

    TubeList is a new way to explore and discover everyday new YouTube channels and support the ones you like. Think of it as a Product Hunt or a Reddit for YouTube channels. TubeList is also a cool way for youtubers to share their work and interact with their community. We built it with Vincent . Featured on Product Hunt.

  • Dataparis.io ➞

    Growth

    DataParis is a representation of Paris public data through the metro network. We built it with my teamates Robin, Vincent and Rémi. The Case Study is on Medium. Featured on Rue89, we even had a radio interview!

  • French Open Data Portal ➞

    Product Management

    This project was for Etalab, the french prime minister task force in charge of deploying the current open data portal. After a lot of research, this is the final prototype we delivered with my teamates Robin, Vincent and Rémi.

  • IMDB Redesign ➞

    Design

    I made this IMDB redesign as a side-project with my teammate Rémi. See the Case Study on Medium. The project has been featured on Sidebar.io, Gizmodo & CSS Design Awards.

OPEN SOURCE - HELP YOURSELF

  • Andy.SCSS ➞

    Product Design

    Andy is an open-source collection of useful SASS mixins. The great majority of those mixins are home-made, but some were found during my researches. Featured on Le Blog du Webdesign, Speckyboy and Designer News.

  • Bootsy Framework ➞

    Product Design

    Bootsy is a Framework for Project Managers. It provides through a single line of command a well-organized folder structure for your project. Featured on Speckyboy, Codevisually, and Hacker News.

TALKS I GAVE

  • Product Management 101 ➞

    Talk given @ HETIC, a french university, on Product Management and, more specifically, the Customer Development methodology from Steve Blank.

  • 3 Growth Hacks To Test In Less Than an Hour ➞

    This is the presentation we made at IdeaLabs in Antwerp, Belgium, for the "Unicorns & Rainbow" conference. The main topic was growth hacking.

  • Mention NPS Process ➞

    NPS is a system to learn more about your customers and automate churn reduction processes. Here's the presentation we made at TheFamily in Paris. You can also watch the video here.

MY LATEST BLOG POST

  • Startup HR: Chief Culture Officer ➞

    Here’s an idea I had the other day after watching “Hiring and Culture” from the startup class series. Here’s what could be a job offer for a Chief Culture Officer. His job would be to help the CEO maintain and coordinate the culture attributes of a company. Such position would probably be relevant only after reaching a certain size and maturity.

There's more posts here
